docs.lead_paragraph: OTTAWA, Dec. 24--Canada has withdrawn nine drugs containing high levels of cobalt. The drugs have been used in treating some cases of anemia.

headline.main: CANADA REMOVES 9 COBALT DRUGS; Move Follows Tests to Study Beer Drinkers' Deaths

docs.abstract: Canada withdraws 9 drugs containing cobalt following experiments with rats showing that under certain conditions high levels cause heart ailment called cardiomyopathy that can be fatal; experiments stemmed from deaths of drinkers of beer containing cobalt additive; some drugs had been used to treat anemia
docs.snippet: OTTAWA, Dec. 24--Canada has withdrawn nine drugs containing high levels of cobalt. The drugs have been used in treating some cases of anemia.
